TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TableLayoutStyleCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

public ref class TableLayoutStyleCollection abstract : System::Collections::IList
type TableLayoutStyleCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 实现表布局样式集合的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality for a collection of table layout styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示用于描述关联的中的列或行的所有样式的集合 。The class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns or rows in an associated . 派生自的类 是专用化的，如下所示：Classes derived from are specialized as follows: - 将 列样式聚合为对象的集合 。A aggregates column styles as a collection of objects. - 将 行样式聚合为对象的集合 。A aggregates row styles as a collection of objects. 的大多数成员 是的实现 。Most of the members of are implementations of .

Public Function Add (style As TableLayoutStyle) As Integer

summary.span: 在当前集合的末尾添加一个新的 。

span.span: Adds a new to the end of the current collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将表布局重新应用于当前容器中的所有控件 。The method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current container. 集合中存储的样式数量仅受可用内存的限制。The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.

summary.span: 断开集合与关联的 之间的关联，并清空该集合。

span.span: Disassociates the collection from its associated and empties the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能重写此方法。This method cannot be overridden. 方法执行两个主要操作：The method performs two main actions: - 它将当前 与其容器断开 ，使样式不再应用于面板中包含的控件的布局。It disassociates the current from its container so that the styles are no longer applied to the layout of the controls contained within the panel. 因此，表布局将重新应用到面板中的所有控件。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel. - 它将清空所有对象的集合 。It empties the collection of all of its objects. 因此，该 属性设置为0。As a result, the property is set to 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一个派生 类型 或 可以存储在中 。Only one of the derived types, or , can be stored in a . 样式的实例只能与单个容器关联。An instance of a style can be associated only with a single container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能重写此方法。This method cannot be overridden. 删除之前 ，它将与其容器解除关联 。Before the is removed, it is disassociated from its container. 因此，表布局将重新应用到面板中的所有控件。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel.
